review: This is a much cooler device than I'd been lead to believe. Great value for the money. Things function a bit strangely and it can be difficult to wrap your head around it. Often forces me attempt to start a video multiple times before it "catches" (mostly on Youtube so far, so maybe its just Youtube's link that isn't stable; Hulu has functioned like a champ).
author: Todd Lucas

review: great product, just wish you could stream everything of the computer.  You can only stream off a web browser.  But still a great product.
